SEC. 3. STUDY REGARDING DISABILITY CLAIMS PROCESSING. The Commissioner of Social Security will conduct a study on processing disability insurance claims, including methods used by State agencies and the Social Security Administration. The Commissioner will analyze current methods for determining disability claims, compare them to other agencies, and report recommendations to Congress within 120 days of the Act's enactment. The Commissioner will report recommendations to Congress within 120 days of the Act's enactment on possible improvements in disability determination methods to expedite the process and address the backlog in claims processing.
